name: Ray Gun
description: Looks like a hand gun, but with a whole lotta -- well like fins and shit.

actions.name: shoot
actions.success: Wow, I can't believe you actually shot him. Oh boy, he's bleedin' out, Morty. Yep, he's definitely dead. Wow, I did not see that coming at all! Totally didn't see it coming.
actions.failure: You missed? Seriously? I mean, come on, Morty, he's like right there!
